lead_paragraph: The data published by the European Central Bank come amid other signs that eurozone banks are recovering from a crisis that began in 2008.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Private Sector Loans in Europe Are Up for First Time in 3 Years
headline.main: E.C.B. Says Loans to Private Sector Rose in March for First Time in 3 Years

snippet: The data published by the European Central Bank come amid other signs that eurozone banks are recovering from a crisis that began in 2008.
abstract: European Central Bank reports bank loans to private sector rose 0.1 percent in March compared with year ago, first increase in three years; rise comes amid other signals that eurozone banking system may be finally recovering from credit crisis triggered in 2008.
